title: Milestone Report
description: Summarize client progress and milestones for tracking and reporting.

body.content: Create a milestone tracking summary for my SBDC client.

body.label: Client First Name
body.tip: Client's first name only — protect PII

body.label: Primary Goal
body.placeholder: e.g. Launch business, Secure SBA loan

body.label: Completed Milestones
body.placeholder: e.g. Jan 2025: Completed business plan draft

body.label: Where Things Stand
body.placeholder: What's currently in progress? Any blockers or upcoming deadlines?

body.content:
Please create a milestone tracking summary that includes:

1. Progress Timeline — a clear chronological summary of milestones achieved
2. Progress Summary — a paragraph suitable for reporting (2-3 sentences)
3. Completion Assessment — estimated progress toward the primary goal (percentage and rationale)
4. Risk Factors — any blockers, delays, or concerns to flag
5. Recommended Next Milestones — 3-5 specific next steps with suggested target dates
6. Impact Metrics — any quantifiable outcomes to report (jobs, revenue, capital, etc.)

Format for both internal tracking and potential inclusion in quarterly impact reports.
